content: --ताति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} having an auspicious end, conferring or conducive to happiness, propitious; प्रयत्न. कृत्स्नोयं फलतु शिवतातिश्च भवतु <ls>Māl. 6. 7.</ls> {2} tender, merciful, not demoniacal; मा पूतनात्वमुपगाः शिवतातिरेधि <ls n="Māl.">9. 49.</ls> (--तिः auspiciousness, happiness.
